mapper.select: SELECT custom_fnm, SUM (odr_qty) "odr_qty" FROM v_order_order_analyze WHERE fact_no = #{factNo} AND rev_odr_date = #{revOdrToday} GROUP BY custom_fnm ORDER BY SUM (odr_qty) DESC

SELECT custom_fnm, SUM (odr_qty) "odr_qty" FROM v_order_order_analyze WHERE fact_no = #{factNo} AND TO_CHAR (TRUNC (TO_DATE (rev_odr_date, 'yyyymmdd'), 'iw'), 'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR (TRUNC (TO_DATE (#{revOdrWeek}, 'yyyymmdd'), 'iw'), 'yyyymmdd') GROUP BY custom_fnm ORDER BY SUM (odr_qty) DESC
SELECT custom_fnm, SUM (odr_qty) "odr_qty" FROM v_order_order_analyze WHERE fact_no = #{factNo} AND SUBSTR (rev_odr_date, 1, 6) = #{revOdrMonth} GROUP BY custom_fnm ORDER BY SUM (odr_qty) DESC
